1112.content:
"Let's see if you can survive under my butt" Veruca giggled. leaving you looking more than a little terrified. Normally you wouldn't have minded if Veruca had sat on your lap for example whilst you were at your regular size but in your shrunken form you are sure you are not going to come out of this unharmed.

"No... wait... please...."
"Mistress!" Violet reminded you, sharply.
"Mistress, please don't do this."
"Shut up, I'll sit on you if I want to, and right now I really want to sit on you."

She lifts off the table and lowers you down onto her chair, placing you roughly in the middle of the seat she then picks up some tape and in a few seconds she has secured you firmly in place.

Smiling broadly, feeling sure she is going to love what she is about to do to you, she now stands in front of the chair, her back towards you. You see the young girl dressed in the same red mink coat and white tights that she was wearing at the factory. You can see all the way up to her butt at the junction of her inner thighs and feel sure you are about to be spending some time under it, under her.

Above you, Veruca bent her legs and sat down, as she descended her mink coat covers you and then her backside comes into contact with your body and bears down upon you. Her red outfit has formed a kind-of tent which completely surrounds you and blocks out all light, leaving you in utter darkness.

Her presence upon you as she sits is total, and more firm than you could ever have imagined. Your different sizes makes you feel like you are trapped under a female mountain with no hope of escape. You can feel nothing but the girl who is now sat comfortably (at least from her perspective) upon you and has relaxed, relishing both the moment and the experenence.

Now she was siting on you, Veruca did not move. She had never had the opportunity to crush a boy before but now that time had come, and she was determined to make it count. She recalled every time her parents had said 'no' to her, and how angry that had made her. She recalled that Wonka had not allowed her to have one of thos silly little Oompa Loompas, that boat of his, whatever she had wanted she was told she could not have it, but this boy could not deny her for he was trapped under her butt, being used as her seat and she allowed all her remembered irritations, her frustration translate into the force she applied to you as she continued to sit on you.

She remained like that some time, allowing you to experience not only her full weight but also all the annoyances, all the frustrations of her life If you could survive all of that then you must surely be the strongest shrunken boy who ever lived.

111212.content:
Time passes, not that you are aware of it.

Only when Veruca speaks are you aware of any change between one moment and the last. You are fully aware of the fact that she is sitting on you, you can not escape the feeling of intense pressure bearing down on your tiny body under her butt cheeks. Her presence upon her seat, upon you is far greater then anything you had ever endured before or even imagined. It is almost impossible to describe what is the force of nature that is bearing down entirely upon you. You can't undertstand how you could possibly still be alive, and in many ways you wish you weren't. You wouldn't be surprised to discover that you had died and gone to Hell, that would possibly explain the immense turture you are being forced to endure by means of her backside; not to mention that her body heat, from your perspective was considerable.

Veruca did not move, she simply continued to sit on you and she was loving every moment of it. She had said she would sit on you until she got bored but she wasn't sure that would ever happen, she was enjoying herself too much. She had made many demands of those around her in her time, been given everything she ever wanted although most of her demands were just whims and she lost interest in them as soon as they came into her possession; not you though. She had you in her thrall, you were hers and she you were right where she wanted you. Being the spoiled brat that she was, Veruca saught power over everything and everyone, she would not be denied anything for she would take whatever she wanted. You were the symbol of her power now, over you she had ultimate control for you could do nothing but remain where you were, a cushion for her to sit upon and you were incapable of being anything else. Every moment she spent sitting on you, she felt you under her but and she loved it. You were her seat, and her seat you would reamin.

Whilst she sat she thought of other people she had met, such as that go-gooder Charlie whom she dispised. It would have been poetic justice if it had been that Charlie who had shrunk, and who would now be living under her butt. In fact he was such a scrawny little shrimp she probably didn't need to even shrink him at all in order to dominate him, if only she had managed to get his meddlesome grandfather out of the way. She didn't have Charlie though, but she did have you and you would suit her just fine.

If anyone entered the room just then they would simply see a girl sat on her chair, for you were completely hidden beneath her. From your perspective though, her body not only surrounded but actually enveloped you. You had become her seat.

She had said she would see if you would survive under her butt, but she really hoped you were still alive and that the matter of your continued survival would not even be a question. Now and again she would grind on you for a time in order to cause you to cry out or make at laeast some sound that would assure you that you were still around. A living butt cushion was after all far more fun than a dead one who would never again feel her sitting on it. She fully intendd to keep you alive for she wanted your torment to go on for a long time, a very long time.

And for a very long time she did continue to sit on you, for hour upon hour you remained exactly where you were, not that you were aware of those hours, not that you could think of anything but the imemensity of the girl herself. This suited her, for it fitted in perfectly with her plans.

When, many hours later she did get up and looked down at you

“Alright little man, its bath time” she said happy as she moved away from her room’s door and into her room’s private bathroom. It was surprisingly bigger then your family’s bathroom as it was also spotless. At least to your eyes.

“This place is filithy. Im going to have to tell daddy to fire that useless servant lady” She said to herself as she walked over to her sink, which so happens to be level with her chest. “And speaking of filthy, thats what you are.... I can see all the poor on you”

She reached over and turned on the water as it started running into the sink. You try to struggle out of her palm but her grip was too strong.

“You can struggle all you want. Your not slipping away, but i think your clothes will” The rich child said as she reached her fingers and pulled off your shirt and then you pants and shoes until you were left in nothing but your underwear.

“Now, do you want me to take them off of you. Or will you be smart enough to do it yourself?” She said as you only thought about it for a second, your reluctantly reached down and pulled off your underwear. Letting her see your little member.

“Good obedience. For that I'm going to be gentle” Veruca said as she brought you under the running cold water and started scrubbing your naked body.

11213.content:
As Veruca walks back into her room, she eyed you down. Almost like she was thinking about something in her head, what that was you have no idea. At the moment your just feeling embarrassed at being washed by this young girl. It was so embarrassing.

Veruca entered her room and sat down on her bed. Laying you down on her lap as you couldn't even look up at her.

“Look up at me” Of course until she ordered. You look up at her as she smiled. “You don't need to look so sad, i have great news for you”

“Your... your gonna let me go?” You ask hopeful, however she dashed those hopes without delay.

“What! Of course not, even if i did that would be bad news. Wouldn't it?”

“Yeah, bad news” You say telling her what she wants.

“No what I've decided is that your promoted” She told you as she did a little pity clap for you

“Promoted... promoted from what?” You ask her.

“You are no longer my pet. After giving you a rub and seeing your body more up close. I've decided to make you my Boyfriend!” Veruca said to you “Isn't that exciting?”

“Yeah... great” You say trying to fake a smile. Veruca grabbed you and lifted up your body. She then puckered her lips as you knew what was coming. As you were driven into her giant lips with not much care whether you can breath. She even brought her finger to your head and plunged you deep.

“Uh... No” You say to her as she loses her smile.

“Your suppose to kiss back!” She yelled at you angrily. She then brought you up to her lips “Were gonna do it again, this time i want you to kiss me back. Understand?” Before you could respond she brought you into her lips, plunging you down just like before. This time though, you kissed her lips back. She pulled you away and asked you the same question “Well, did you kiss back?”

“And how was it, was it the best kiss you've ever had?” Veruca asked as you told her again.

“Yes”

“Great. You know, if you keep acting like this. your gonna make one heck of a boyfriend” Veruca said as you weren't surprised she said that. Of course this Brat would want a Yes Man of a boyfriend. Someone who's afraid of her.

She placed you back on her lap. As she started petting you, something normally reserved for a pet but you feel like she doesn't see much of a difference for you. “You know, I've never had a boyfriend. I wonder what a boyfriend does for a girlfriend. Maybe you would know?”

You think about you answer before you tell her

121.content:
You look around bewildered, something is wrong.

A girlish voice behind you says, "Oh my gosh you are so tiny, I just must have you!"

You look up the enormous girl and then it dawns on you what is wrong. You have been shrunk! You are no bigger than 3 inches tall! With a shriek you say, "What's going on? Someone help!"

Veruca picks you up and says, "Are you another creation of Mr. Wonka? A special kind of candy?"

You're eyes widen, "No, no no no! I'm a human girl, please go to Mr. Wonka and tell him that I've been shrunk somehow, he has to fix me."

The giant girl looks at you and then gets a sly grin. "Hmmm I don't think so. I think I'm going to keep you."

You couldn't believe this! What a brat! "What? You can't do that, find him now or you'll be in trouble!"

The giant hand squeezed your body and you thought you were going to get smashed into a pulp. You couldn't breathe and you felt you were to the bursting point when she eased up on the pressure.

"Naughty little dolly, you don't talk back to me. Apologize."

You couldn't believe the predicament that you were in. First you were shrunk down and now you were at the mercy of this cruel little (well...) brat! She could do anything to you. Of course you did have your pride, having to apologize to her would be horrible, you hadn't done anything wrong. She had you at your mercy though... what were you going to do?
121.title: Veruca Salt

info.description:
This is my first story and I haven't seen any wonka stuff on here and I saw something on tv so.

You go to the gate and go in, Wonka let's the children explore by themselves you go to the T.V. room and accidently shrink yourself only to have one of these girls find you, and take you home right away caring more about playing with a small human than chocolate.

Vereuca Salt (1971 Version): She is bossy and always gets what she wants. Very cruel doesn't care about anyone but herself. Loves to be mean to her playthings no matter what and torture them with whatever she can find, even tools. Also very demanding.
http://nickmain.files.wordpress.com/2007/11/halloween-07-veruca-salt-costume-ste... she's the one on the left she is wearing what she is there.

Veruca Salt (2004 Version): Same attitude as the 1971 version, only she's more concerned about having a pet or a doll to play with, and even more cruel to people smaller than herself. Tends to get violent when her playthings disobey her. http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/4500000/Veruca-Salt-charlie-and-the-choc... wearing what she has on there.

Violet Beauregarde (2004 Version): Loves bubblegum and she's very competitive really wants to play "games" with her toys. Very playful, loves to play dress up and have sparring sessions with her toys. May have stolen an item from wonkas shop that turns whatever eats it into a bubblegum like substance that can't die or lose flavor always turns to original shape after eaten
